fullplot: A Mexican boy smuggles himself to Brooklyn to meet his long-lost father - only to have his identity stolen upon arrival by an impostor who seeks to steal the fathers' fortune.
plot: A Mexican boy smuggles himself to Brooklyn to meet his long-lost father - only to have his identity stolen upon arrival by an impostor who seeks to steal the fathers' fortune.
title: Sangre de mi sangre

tomatoes.consensus: This suspenseful Mexican drama portrays the immigrant experience with grit and poignancy.
